definition[0]: advice, criticism etc about how successful or useful something is
example[0]: How can I provide feedback without making someone angry?
example[1]: Try to give each student some feedback on the task.
definition[1]: a very unpleasant high noise, caused when a microphone is too close to an amplifier
definition[2]: advice or criticism about how well you are doing your job and what you could do to improve. Managers usually give feedback to their employees
example[2]: The line manager judges the trainee’s work and provides feedback.
definition[3]: advice or criticism about products or ideas for new products. Employees or the public usually give this kind of feedback to a company’s managers
example[3]: We launched a customer survey to obtain feedback on customer perception of our products, service and performance.
